statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandName , AA.ChannelFitness , AA.HomePage , AA.StyleOrSku , AA.Email , AA.Phone , AA.MainGoods , AA.Category , AA.Style , AA.Price , AA.Description , AA.TopCategory , AA.BrandMainUrl , AA.BrandLogoUrl
FROM dbo.TSearchBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.BrandName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.ChannelFitness LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.HomePage LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.StyleOrSku LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Email LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Phone LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.MainGoods LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Category LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Style LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Price LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Description LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.TopCategory LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandName , AA.ChannelFitness , AA.HomePage , AA.StyleOrSku , AA.Email , AA.Phone , AA.MainGoods , AA.Category , AA.Style , AA.Price , AA.Description , AA.TopCategory , AA.BrandMainUrl , AA.BrandLogoUrl
FROM dbo.TSearchBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TSearchBrand ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, BrandName, ChannelFitness, HomePage, StyleOrSku, Email, Phone, MainGoods, Category, Style, Price, Description, TopCategory, BrandMainUrl, BrandLogoUrl ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #BrandName#, #ChannelFitness#, #HomePage#, #StyleOrSku#, #Email#, #Phone#, #MainGoods#, #Category#, #Style#, #Price#, #Description#, #TopCategory#, #BrandMainUrl#, #BrandLogoUrl# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TSearchBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, BrandName = #BrandName# , ChannelFitness = #ChannelFitness# , HomePage = #HomePage# , StyleOrSku = #StyleOrSku# , Email = #Email# , Phone = #Phone# , MainGoods = #MainGoods# , Category = #Category# , Style = #Style# , Price = #Price# , Description = #Description# , TopCategory = #TopCategory# , BrandMainUrl = #BrandMainUrl# , BrandLogoUrl = #BrandLogoUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#
